channel.title: Looking For Partner To Run My 718 Project With
channel.description:
[center][b] Hello[/b], I'll be keeping details minimal here. I'm looking for someone to accompany me in running my project. Everything is properly functional. [b]ONLY[/b] contact me if you're a serious candidate please. If you're interested or have questions PM me your skype name, and I'll reach you immediately. This is a long-term project. I've been working on it under-the-radar for some time now, and it's finally just about ready to be released. [size=12pt][u][b]Note:[/b][/u][/size] If you're just in it for the money, don't bother contacting me.
[u][b]Qualifications:[/b][/u]
- You must have a decent amount of knowledge in Java - You must be trustworthy & respectful - You must keep strong communication with me - You must be able to help create new ideas for systems, and content with me
[u][b]What Will YOU Receive?:[/b][/u] For your hard work, and dedication I will be splitting the donations with you. The donation split will be; 35%, 35%, 30%. 35 to me, 35 to you, 30 into a separate Pay-pal to cover 'Server Funds'.
[u][b]Additional Server Details & Information:[/b][/u] [u]Revision:[/u] 718 [u]Sort:[/u] Economy [u]Current Stage:[/u] Development Stage
[u][b]Some features & content:[/b][/u] - New master cape designs - Boss Pets - 12 Mini-Games (Soul Wars, Hunger Games, Castle Wars, Fight Pits, Fight Caves, Fight Kiln + Capes and more) - Quick Chat - Trivia Bot - Referral System (will be hosting refer a friend event) - Sinkholes - Custom made Dungeoneering (We will have the real thing) - Shooting Stars - Living Rock Caverns - Client Zooming - Iron-man mode & Hardcore Iron-man - Loot-beams - All skills are trainable - All tier 90 gear: Malevolent, Drygores, Sirenic, Ascensions, Tectonic, Seismic, etc - Dual wielding with CLEAN sheathing - Several neat features that brings the community to work together - All the bosses are added, with some more to add
And much more..
Thank you :)[/center]

item.title: Looking For Partner To Run My 718 Project With
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[center] Hello, I’ll be keeping details minimal here. I’m looking for someone to accompany me in running my project.
Everything is properly functional. ONLY contact me if you’re a serious candidate please. If you’re interested or have questions PM me your skype name, and I’ll reach you immediately. This is a long-term project. I’ve been working on it under-the-radar for some time now, and it’s finally just about ready to be released.
[size=12pt]Note:[/size]
If you’re just in it for the money, don’t bother contacting me.

Qualifications:

  • You must have a decent amount of knowledge in Java
  • You must be trustworthy & respectful
  • You must keep strong communication with me
  • You must be able to help create new ideas for systems, and content with me

What Will YOU Receive?:
For your hard work, and dedication I will be splitting the donations with you.
The donation split will be; 35%, 35%, 30%.
35 to me, 35 to you, 30 into a separate Pay-pal to cover ‘Server Funds’.

Additional Server Details & Information:
Revision: 718
Sort: Economy
Current Stage: Development Stage

Some features & content:

  • New master cape designs
  • Boss Pets
  • 12 Mini-Games (Soul Wars, Hunger Games, Castle Wars, Fight Pits, Fight Caves, Fight Kiln + Capes and more)
  • Quick Chat
  • Trivia Bot
  • Referral System (will be hosting refer a friend event)
  • Sinkholes
  • Custom made Dungeoneering (We will have the real thing)
  • Shooting Stars
  • Living Rock Caverns
  • Client Zooming
  • Iron-man mode & Hardcore Iron-man
  • Loot-beams
  • All skills are trainable
  • All tier 90 gear: Malevolent, Drygores, Sirenic, Ascensions, Tectonic, Seismic, etc
  • Dual wielding with CLEAN sheathing
  • Several neat features that brings the community to work together
  • All the bosses are added, with some more to add

And much more…

Thank you :)[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: Looking For Partner To Run My 718 Project With
